javadoc: BrowserCodeUnitFormat provides a code unit format based upon a common set of viewer Options for specific Tool. The associated options correspond to the Browser Operand Fields category.

methods.javadoc:
Construct code unit format for specified serviceProvider with autoUpdate enabled.
@param serviceProvider service provider (e.g., Tool)
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct code unit format for specified serviceProvider with autoUpdate enabled.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct code unit format for specified serviceProvider.

params.name: autoUpdate
params.comment: if true format will auto update if associated options are changed.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Construct code unit format for specified field options.
 This constructor must be used by the field factory since an OptionsService may
 not obtainable at the time they are constructed.

params.name: autoUpdate
params.comment:
if true format will auto update if associated options are changed, in 
 addition any listeners will be notified when this format is updated.

methods.name: addChangeListener
methods.comment:
Add a change listener to the underlying format options.  When a format change
 occurs the listener may wish to trigger a refresh of of any formatted code units.

methods.javadoc:
Remove an existing change listener from the underlying format options.
@param listener change listener
methods.name: removeChangeListener
methods.comment: Remove an existing change listener from the underlying format options.

name: BrowserCodeUnitFormat
comment:
BrowserCodeUnitFormat provides a code unit format based upon
 a common set of viewer Options for specific Tool.  The associated options correspond to
 the Browser Operand Fields category.
